trans-unit.target: TEXT_STMBDZ205_02677_SEQ_00<tab>Hayama appears to be deeply engrossed in surveying the seas.
TEXT_STMBDZ205_02677_TODO_00<tab>Survey the designated spots and slay the ominous onibi.

TEXT_STMBDZ205_02677_HAYAMA_000_000<tab>Kami above! Y-You can't just sneak up on someone like that! Now, what is it you need? If you do not require anything, I ask that you kindly allow me to return to watch du─

TEXT_STMBDZ205_02677_HAYAMA_000_001<tab>Ah─at second glance, you appear to be far stronger than the average <var 09 E948 ((Hyur)) ((Elezen)) ((Lalafell)) ((Miqo'te)) ((Roegadyn)) ((Au Ra)) ((Hrothgar)) ((Viera)) /var>. Perhaps there is something you can help me with. Lately we've been seeing eerie flashing lights along the eastern coast of Sakazuki.

TEXT_STMBDZ205_02677_HAYAMA_000_002<tab>I-It is probably just the ships passing though this area but some of the men here are convinced it is an onibi. They are terrified. Would you go and have a look for us?

TEXT_STMBDZ205_02677_HAYAMA_000_003<tab>The lights were last spotted to the northwest of here. If it turns out to be an onibi, after all, please see that it is dispatched. I-I would go and take care of it myself, of course, but I simply cannot leave my post here.
TEXT_STMBDZ205_02677_HAYAMA_000_004<tab>To the northwest of here is where the lights were last spotted. Please go there and, if there truly is an onibi, see that it is dispatched.
TEXT_STMBDZ205_02677_SYSTEM_000_009<tab>Try as you might, you do not spot any ominous onibi.
TEXT_STMBDZ205_02677_HAYAMA_000_010<tab>So you mean to say there was no onibi─only tiny little fire sprites?
TEXT_STMBDZ205_02677_HAYAMA_000_011<tab>Hahahaha! I cannot wait to reveal the news to the others. They will feel so foolish for being frightened!
TEXT_STMBDZ205_02677_HAYAMA_000_012<tab>A reward, you say? Is the act of doing a kind deed for a fellow man not reward enough? Hahaha! I am just joking, of course. Here you go!
